title: Ghostbusters 1984 BRrip 1080P x264 MP4 - Ofek
description:
Please leave feedback!

Source: Bluray (Special thanks to: amazon . com, PublicHD, RARBG, KRaLiMaRKo, IMKNONOBODY (formerly BOZX), Grym a.k.a. vonRicht on TPB (for extras only), CHD, CHDBits, BONZO, HDCLUB, CtrlHD, HDWinG, HighCode, FraMeSToR, DVDSEED, R2D2, EbP, HDChina, LAZERS, BLUEBIRD, BluDragon)

Used denoise and/or sharpening filters, looks extremely crisp.  Subtitles were done myself, and are perfect.

Note: I "remastered" this already-remastered-in-4K bluray using a complex set of custom Avisynth scripts I wrote to remove the intense grain present in this old film and sharpen it further, among other things.  Tell me what you think :)
